__TOC__

== Documentation Team IRC Lessons ==

The documentation team should run a series of lessons to train new users in our processes and reduce the learning curve for new users.

=== Proposed Lessons ===
** ''Getting the source'' Using bazaar and getting the source, working through the folder structure and discussing tools such as the validate script and building PDF. --DougieRichardson
** ''Bugs'' Taking an example bug from Launchpad and working through assigning it to creating a patch. --DougieRichardson
** ''Wiki'' Taking a wiki bug from Launchpad, registering on the wiki, covering syntax and amending. Touching on the importance of standards and uniformity. --DougieRichardson
